description:
Save your extra energy for pumping up the climb trail, not pumping up your tire. With its large volume barrel OneUp’s EDC pump gets more air into your tire with every stroke, so you get to spend more time one the trail than on the side of it.

  • Aluminum construction with a grippy machined finish
  • Fast-on head simply presses onto the Presta valve
  • Category leading air volume to weight ratio
  • Dimensions: 19.4 x 3.2cm
  • Fits EDC tool and small storage capsule or a 20g CO2 (sold separately)
  • Integrated CO2 inflator
  • Fully sealed to keep trail chunder out
  • Included mount tucks under your bottle cage
name: OneUp EDC 100cc Pump
